attributes.action: Every dog must be put On lead when out and about unless muzzles or field secure
attributes.additional_details: Dogs different types different Backgrouds will attack. Another dogs or child or an object one day in their life that why all dogs have to be put on leads no matter what unless u what to Put Ur dog down when that day Comes
attributes.background: Fine or warner dog owner if dogs not on leads every dog will attack hate. Seen post on dogs been attack by others. dogs On and off the Lead  all dogs should be put On The Leads unless u what more attack happen

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318675
